nodes.text: The Bio-antidote package was an implant that maintained an ever-circulating stream of antitoxins in the user, increasing the relevant antidote for any specific poisons introduced into the user's system. Side effects caused by the implant included giving the user a dry mouth.
In Knights of the Old Republic, the playable character must have the implant feat at level 3.
In Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords, the playable character must have a constitution attribute of 14 or higher.
